properties.description: Warm Welcome Fridays @ Emmanuel. Open 9am - 5pm every Friday serving: All-day tea/coffee and biscuits; Morning cheese and tomato rolls; Homemade soup at lunch; Afternoon cake! No charge for any refreshments, but should a donation be made, it will be passed to The Vine Foodbank, New Addington. Closing on Good Friday and reopening on Friday 14th April from 10am – 4pm with a new summer menu.

properties.address: Rockhmapton Road, South Croydon, Surrey, CR2 7AQ, United Kingdom
properties.description:
Our lounge is based in the Gallery in Emmanuel Centre.

Open every Friday 10am-5pm

Light refreshments all day, light lunch of soup and roll, (Rolls, wraps, fillings in the summer months).

 Time to chat, read a newspaper, just sit, do a puzzle, different hobbies and craft, meet new people or be on your own in a quiet reflective space to be still or pray. 

Everyone welcome. Pop in for a quick drink/chat or come and stay as long as you wish

hours._text:

Open every Friday 10am-5pm

Light refreshments all day, light lunch of soup and roll, (Rolls, wraps, fillings in the summer months).

Everyone welcome. Pop in for a quick drink/chat or come and stay as long as you wish

FoodCycle hosts a FREE three-course meal all made from food that would go to waste.

properties.address: Normanton Road, South Croydon, Surrey, CR2 7AF, United Kingdom
properties.description:
Emmanuel Church wants to invite residents in need of a warm space to join their many activities at the church, including:


Selam English classes for women (Tuesday and Thursday morning)


Keep Fit for Older people (Friday morning)

Circuit training (Tuesday evening)

Badminton Club (Wednesday evening)


Bumps and Babies (Thursday afternoon)

Emmanuel toddlers (Wednesday morning)

Saturdads (Saturday morning)


Church service (Sunday morning)

The Rock service (Sunday morning)

Friday Rockz service (Friday evening)

20’s-30’s Pot Luck Cafe (Tuesday, Thursday, Sunday)


Find out more athttps://croydon.simplyconnect.uk/providers/bd4f9660-4d52-11ed-beaf-2dae8c6e01e7/emmanuel-church?

properties.title: The Westway

properties.address: 77 Ashley Rd, Epsom KT18 5AQ

hours._text: Our Warm Wednesdays programme will operate every Wednesday (including over the Christmas period) until the end of February. From 09.000 hot drinks will be available. A choice of soups and a buttered roll will be on offer from 12.30-14.00. From 14.00 we will serve hot drinks and homemade cakes. From 15.00 the focus will be on providing an after-school club with spaces for homework, reading, playing and boardgames. At 17.00 we will serve a hot meal and dessert.
